name: Country Quiz
description: In this first edition of Country Quiz you are able to learn and test your knowledge of all the 201 flags of official countries of the world. Gain XP, collect trophies, move up in leaderboards and calculate your Flag IQ all the while you are having fun learning about official flags. Put your friends and family members on your Local Leaderboard and compare your knowledge of flags. Later editions plan to expand to capitals, currencies and other aspects of the countries.
